<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Buckler Dance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1543) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 91 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You are wielding a [buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1).

</column>

---

You spin your buckler defensively toward every attack. While you are in this stance, you constantly have your buckler raised as if you'd used [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98), as long as you meet that action's requirements.
name: Buckler Dance
